    • 方法详细资料

      • supportHandle

        public int supportHandle()
        从接口复制的说明: TransactionHandle
        Check whether this handle supports given game type id. For each service handle there should be a dedicated implementation.
        返回:
        the game type id of supported airtime handle.

      • getTransactionModel

        public java.lang.Object getTransactionModel(Context respCtx,
                                   Transaction targetTrans)
                                     throws ApplicationException
        The modle of 'voucher sale' should be voucher.
        参数:
        respCtx - response context
        targetTrans - Query transaction object by transaction message id
        返回:
        model transaction object
        抛出:
        ApplicationException
